rows.label: bf03170100_0010
rows.name: The Blade turned back into a Core Crystal...

rows.label: bf03170100_0020
rows.name:
So that monster was in resonance
with the Blade...

rows.label: bf03170100_0030
rows.name:
Tora couldn't resonate, and yet a monster could...
So unfair!

rows.label: bf03170100_0040
rows.name: But now Tora has Hana, doesn't he?

rows.label: bf03170100_0050
rows.name: Hanaaa!

rows.label: bf03170100_0060
rows.name:
This is what happens to a Blade 
when it loses its Driver.

rows.label: bf03170100_0070
rows.name: Will it never return to normal?

rows.label: bf03170100_0080
rows.name:
No, after some time the Core's light will return
and then it can resonate again.

rows.label: bf03170100_0090
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf03170100_0100
rows.name: There's a but?

rows.label: bf03170100_0110
rows.name:
At that time, it won't have 
its previous memories.

rows.label: bf03170100_0120
rows.name:
It will be born again as a completely 
new Blade.

rows.label: bf03170100_0130
rows.name:
Is that so...
That's somehow sad.

rows.label: bf03170100_0140
rows.name:
To have all of your past wiped out
like that...

rows.label: bf03170100_0150
rows.name:
But I think it's because we remember that
there are painful and difficult things.

rows.label: bf03170100_0160
rows.name:
As long as the Core exists, 
a Blade's life is eternal.

rows.label: bf03170100_0170
rows.name:
It's just as well. Eternity is a long
time to collect bad memories.

rows.label: bf03170100_0180
rows.name: Homura...

rows.label: bf03170100_0190
rows.name: I'm sorry.

rows.label: bf03170100_0200
rows.name:
I was just thinking, sometimes
being able to forget is a...blessing.

rows.label: bf03170100_0210
rows.name: Come on! Let's get finished up here!

rows.label: bf03170100_0220
rows.name: That's...

rows.label: bf03170100_0230
rows.name: A Core Crystal!

rows.label: bf03170100_0240
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: bf03170100_0250
rows.name: Blade Cores are produced by the Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf03170100_0260
rows.name: This one's brand new and ready to resonate.

rows.label: bf03170100_0270
rows.name: This Core will meet many Drivers from now on

rows.label: bf03170100_0280
rows.name:
experience their deaths, and with renewed memories,
will continue to resonate with different Drivers.

rows.label: bf03170100_0290
rows.name:
The death of Divine Beasts, the death of Drivers...
Blades exist upon countless deaths.

rows.label: bf03170100_0300
rows.name: This conscious rebirth is what creates history.

rows.label: bf03170100_0310
rows.name: A long history. Going beyond humanity.

rows.label: bf03170100_0320
rows.name: Beyond humanity...

rows.label: bf03170150_0010
rows.name:
Homura has been in that form
since we first met her...

rows.label: bf03170150_0020
rows.name:
I wonder if Homura's Driver is still 
alive somewhere?

rows.label: bf03170150_0030
rows.name: Or...
